count_events_on_host.comment: TODO: Add Windows event log data to the elastic and then configure this metric again
count_events_on_host.query: type:syslog_nxlog AND LogType:WindowsEventLog AND EventID:{{#arg2}} AND host:{{#arg1}}

drops_per_internal_dstip.comment: TODO: Add IPTABLES firewall logs to the elastic and then configure this metric again

drops_per_internal_srcip.comment: TODO: Add IPTABLES firewall logs to the elastic and then configure this metric again

number_of_drops_per_policy.comment: TODO: Add IPTABLES firewall logs to the elastic and then configure this metric again
number_of_drops_per_policy.query: sotool:snmptrapd_fortigate OR sotool:fortigate OR type:syslog_checkpoint) AND host:"{{#arg1}}" AND policyid:{{#arg2}} AND status:("blocked" "drop" "deny")

number_of_handle_manipulation_and_audit_.comment: TODO: Add events (from nxlog for example) and configure this metric again

number_of_iis_log_reports_for_host_on_po.comment: TODO: Add IIS events (from nxlog for example) and configure this metric again
number_of_iis_log_reports_for_host_on_po.query: (dstip:{{#arg1}} OR ((dstip:\:\:1 OR dstip:fe80\:\:\:\:) AND (s_computername:"{{#arg2}}" OR path:"{{#arg2}}"))) AND NOT dstip:10.253.0.170 AND sotool:iis AND dstport:{{#arg3}}

number_of_iis_log_reports.comment: TODO: Add IIS events (from nxlog for example) and configure this metric again
number_of_iis_log_reports.query: (dstip:{{#arg1}} OR ((dstip:\:\:1 OR dstip:fe80\:\:\:\:) AND (s_computername:"{{#arg2}}" OR path:"{{#arg2}}"))) AND sotool:iis AND dstport:{{#arg3}}

number_of_eicar_test_file.comment: TODO: Add Anti-Virus logs and add script for creating the eicar file periodically and configure this metric again

ids_alerts_for_host.query: (event_type:snort AND (destination_ip:{{#arg1}} OR source_ip:{{#arg1}}) AND _exists_:priority AND priority:1) OR (event_type:bro_notice AND (destination_ip:{{#arg1}} OR source_ip:{{#arg1}}))

ids_attacks_for_host.query: (event_type:snort AND (destination_ip:{{#arg1}} OR source_ip:{{#arg1}}) AND _exists_:priority AND priority:2) OR (event_type:bro_notice AND (destination_ip:{{#arg1}} OR source_ip:{{#arg1}}))

dns_tcp_requests_per_source_ip.query: event_type:bro_conn AND protocol:tcp AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.dns}) AND source_ip:{{#arg1}}

number_of_requests_per_url.query: event_type:bro_http AND virtual_host:{{#arg1}} AND uri:{{#arg2}} AND method:{{#arg3}} AND destination_port:{{#arg4}}

external_ips_pinging_the_org.query: (NOT source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network}) AND NOT source_ip:0.0.0.0) AND (source_ip:/[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}/) AND protocol:icmp

org_dns_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.dns}) AND connection_state:"SF"

external_dns_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND NOT (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.dns}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_tftp_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.tftp}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_ftp_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.ftp}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_mysql_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.mysql}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_mssql_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.mssql}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_pgsql_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.pgsql}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_ldap_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.ldap}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_dhcp_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.dhcp}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_ssh_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.ssh}) AND connection_state:"SF"

org_http_verbs.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_http AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND _exists_:method AND NOT method:"-"

ext_http_verbs.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_http AND NOT (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND _exists_:method AND NOT method:"-"

org_web_servers.query: (source_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND event_type:bro_conn AND (destination_ip:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.networks.lan-network})) AND destination_port:({#smart-onion.config.dynamic.learned.ports.websites}) AND connection_state:"SF"
